channel.title: Nick Cave on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nick Cave and Bryce Dessner Original Song Added to Oscar-Contending ‘Train Dreams’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The tune, which shares a name with the film, has been added over the film’s end credits.
